history.text: hello
hello
i just saw a great movie
it is called the wolf of wall street
Oh I loved that movie
Decaprio was great
yes he was - i dont understand but cinema score rated it a C
i would surely rate it an A
I am not sure why they would. Must have not liked the story line?
I think it was great because it really showed how things were
yes, i guess it being a black comedy - whatever that means
maybe it means that it was a comedy but it was a bit dark because of the drugs and storyline
I am not sure how people knew how to take it
I think some took it as a documentary, others as a societal commentary

yes - i was in the mortgage business in the early 2000s so i really understood the boiler room brokerage idea because that is how the place i worked at was ran so i saw it having a true place in history
I am sure the drugs and storyline didnt help
Its interesting to hear it was really like that
they did penny stocks - we did subprime mortgage refinancing... still the agressive pitch style
Scary actually that it was allowed to florish
And yet we have telemarketers now. I guess we will always have this type of stuff. Just in a new form.
yes in the movie it protratys the life of sex and drugs and i remember our bosses would rent out whole bars and just have an area of the bar stocked with free drinks
I guess thats how they were able to justify it. Also, it feeds the beast. People want more of that lifestyle so they will do whatever it takes to get it
it was not pump and dump like the movie but it was high profit wrapped into a loan and led to the housing crisis... i now work for a bank and teach good finances haha
yes people always want more - it plays on psychology and it happens alot
the movie does go to extremes with the swiss bank accounts and such - but with the panama papers coming out, i think thats not as rare either '
Hey at least you learned your lessons
I was lucky I was never wrapped up in any of that stuff.

yes i got out when i was refiing a friend and they wanted me to do a huge fee because they would never know and we got in a fight over why i was doing the job and i wouldnt screw a friend just because he trusted me .. but back to the movie it was good to see that they did get caught
there is surely a use for sales techniques if used for good
eventually they had to slip up
I really liked how the movie highlighted that part and showed how negative and toxic the entire system was
yes i think the best part of the movie is the fact that you can see that too
